entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Markham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Buttonville Municipal Airport 12:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: WNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 10:17 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:17 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets changing to periods of rain or drizzle overnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 10:17 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. Forecast issued 10:17 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
